response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1,500,000 to you. However, considering the current market conditions and the value proposition, we are willing to extend an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving of $300,000 compared to its perceived value to you. We are confident this price will make the deal attractive while ensuring a fair return on our investment. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
